Basic module

  • System
    • child_process- Subprocess management module
    • console- console access object
    • coroutine- Concurrency control module
    • global- the global object, the base object accessible to all scripts
    • gui- gui module
    • os-Module osis one of the core modules used to run the operating system functions. It provides utility functions for interacting with the operating system, including file addresses, file paths, network interfaces, hostnames, operating system types, etc.
    • process- Process processing module, used to manage the resources of the current process
    • timers- The timers module is a built-in module that provides some time-related functions and objects, including setTimeout(), setInterval(), clearInterval(), clearTimeout(), etc.
    • tty- tty module
    • vm- Security sandbox module, used to isolate operating environments with different security levels
    • worker_threads- worker base module
  • File System
    • fs- The fs module is a file system manipulation module. It provides disk I/O operations such as reading files, writing files, opening files, closing files, and changing file permissions, and supports both synchronous and asynchronous usage. The fs module also provides the file monitor function, which can monitor the changes of files and directories in the file system and call back the specified function.
    • io- Input and output processing module
    • path- The path module is a core module that provides some utility functions to work with file and directory paths. It doesn't check if the path exists or is a valid path, it just provides methods to handle paths
    • path_posix- File path processing module
    • path_win32- File path processing module
  • network
    • dgram- One of the basic modules of dgram, mainly used to realize the encapsulation of UDP data packet socket.
    • dns- dns domain name query module
    • http- The http module encapsulates the processing of HTTP requests and responses, allowing us to easily create an http server, or simulate a client to initiate an http request. Using the http module, developers can easily write and process code related to the HTTP protocol
    • mq- Message queue module
    • net- Web access module
    • punycode- punycode internationalized domain name conversion module
    • querystring- The querystring module provides some utility functions for parsing and serializing URL query parameters. Using the querystring module, you can easily parse URL query parameters into objects or strings, and you can also serialize objects into URL query parameter strings
    • ssl- The ssl module is a built-in encryption module of fibjs, which can be used to establish the SSL hypertext transfer protocol for network connections. This module provides cryptographic authentication so that clients and servers can ensure that connections are secure
    • url- url processing module, the url module provides the Url class for processing URL-related operations, including parsing, assembling, splicing, etc.
    • ws- websocket support module
  • Encoding
    • base32- base32 encoding and decoding module
    • base64- base64 encoding and decoding module
    • base58- base58 encoding and decoding module
    • encoding-Module encodingis a built-in module of FibJS, which is used to realize the conversion between various data encoding formats and binary. These data encoding formats include base64, base32, hex, json, msgpack, multibase, base58etc. some commonly used data encoding formats.
    • hex- The hex module is a built-in module that provides a hexadecimal implementation between encoding and decoding binary data and ASCII characters. hexThe module provides two functions of encoding and decoding
    • iconv- iconvis a built-in conversion module for data conversion between various encodings
    • json- json encoding and decoding module
    • multibase- multibase is based on Base1x encoding, introducing a variety of encoding prefix encoding methods
    • msgpack- msgpack is a lighter data exchange format than JSON, it can serialize JSON objects into binary data to achieve faster and more efficient data exchange
    • string_decoder- Decode Buffer to string
  • Crypto
    • crypto-module cryptois the fibjsbuilt-in encryption algorithm module. It provides functions such as symmetric encryption, asymmetric encryption, digest algorithm, and cryptographic random number generator. Before using it, the module needs to require('crypto')be loaded .
    • hash- The hash module is mainly used to implement the message digest algorithm, which is a very important sub-module in the implementation of the encryption algorithm. At the same time, the message digest algorithm is also the basis of many encryption algorithms.
  • Compress
    • zip- The zip module is a module for file compression and decompression. It provides operations such as compressing, decompressing, finding and enumerating the list of files in a zip file
    • zlib- zlib is a built-in compression module that supports multiple compression formats and modes such as gzip, deflate, and zlib
  • test
    • assert- Assertion test module, if the test value is false, it will report an error, the error behavior can be set to continue running or throw an error
    • performance- performance Basic performance monitoring module
    • perf_hooks- perf_hooks base module
    • profiler- Memory profiler module
    • test- The test module is a test framework, combined with the assertion module, assertit is convenient to write various test cases
  • Utility
    • db- Database access module
    • gd- The gd module is a module for image processing, which provides the functions of creating, manipulating, and storing images, and provides rich color, filter, drawing and other related operations.
    • registry- The registry module is a module for manipulating the Windows Registry (Registry). It provides methods and constants to access the registry, which can be read, modified, deleted, added and other operations. The registry module provides operations similar to those used by Windows applications, but provides capabilities in FibJS. Constants include constants such as Root and data types, and some constants for the return values ​​of different operations
    • util- The util module provides practical utility functions such as judging data types, copying object properties, parsing template strings, and event processing
    • uuid- The uuid module provides unique id creation operations. It can be used to generate UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) ​​that meets various requirements
    • xml- xml processing module, you can use the xml module to parse and process xml and html files
  • Constants
    • constants- Commonly used constant definition module
    • fs_constants- Common constant definition module of fs module
